clubInfo.name: Talent FC Chennai
clubInfo.tagline: Building Champions On and Off the Field
clubInfo.mission: Talent FC trains young footballers with discipline, teamwork, and elite coaching. We develop confident, disciplined individuals who carry sportsmanship into all aspects of life.
clubInfo.vision: To create empowered athletes who excel in football and life, while promoting women's sports and breaking barriers in Indian football.

programs.name: Youth Development Program
programs.description: Foundation program focusing on basic skills, teamwork, and love for the game. Perfect for beginners and young enthusiasts.

programs.name: Advanced Training Program
programs.description: Intensive training for competitive players, including tactical training, physical conditioning, and mental preparation for tournaments.

programs.name: Elite Squad Program
programs.description: Premier program for serious athletes preparing for state and national level competitions. Includes specialised coaching and tournament participation.

programs.name: Women's Open Program
programs.description: Training program for adult women looking to stay fit, learn football, or return to the sport after a break.

achievements: Multiple players selected for district and state teams
Featured in local and regional press for community impact
Expanded training programs across multiple age groups

testimonials.name: Asha R.
testimonials.quote: Talent FC transformed my daughter's confidence â€” the coaches combine discipline with care and skill development.

testimonials.name: Meera K.
testimonials.quote: Training here helped me make the state trials. The coaching is tough but supportive, and the team feels like family.
